original: Lagerfelt, Carl-Fredrik, friherre, kammarherre, Gismestad, Vikingstad, f. 13/9/81 i Vikingstad, östergötl. 1., av godsäg., frih. Adolf L. o. Regina Grill. G. 13 m. Agathe Wrede. Barn: Birgitta f. 14, Louise 17, Agneta 19, Otto 20, d. 42, Carl Henrik 23, Madeleine 26. — Mog:ex. i Norrköp. 01, jur. prel :ex. i Lund 02, hovr:ex. i Upps. 07. Riddarhuskanslist 20, avsk. 44, förste kanslisekr. i eckhdep. 30, avsk. 45, vice ceremonimäst. v. H. M. Konungens hov 29-41, kammarherre 19. Äger o. bebor Gismestad i Östergötl. sed. 45. GV:sJmt, RNO, fd. härold v. KM O, RVO, KBLeopn:sO, KDD02gr, OffltKrO.
translated: Lagerfelt, Carl-Fredrik, Baron, Chamberlain, Gismestad, Vikingstad, b. 13/9/81 in Vikingstad, Östergötland. 1st son of Estate Owner, Baron Adolf L. and Regina Grill. Married in 1913 to Agathe Wrede. Children: Birgitta, b. 1914; Louise, b. 1917; Agneta, b. 1919; Otto, b. 1920, deceased 1942; Carl Henrik, b. 1923; Madeleine, b. 1926. Received degree in law from Norrköping in 1901, preliminary degree in Lund in 1902, appellate court degree in Uppsala in 1907. Riddarhuskanslist in 1920, retired in 1944, first secretary at the Exchequer Department in 1930, retired in 1945, deputy master of ceremonies at H.M. the King's court from 1929-1941, chamberlain since 1919. Owns and resides at Gismestad in Östergötland since 1945. Society of the Friends of Manuscripts, Knight of the North Star, former herald of the Royal Order of Knights, Knight Commander of the Order of the Polar Star, Royal Swedish Order of the Lion, Knight of the Order of Leopold (Belgium), 2nd grade of the Order of the Sword.

memberOf.name: Society of the Friends of Manuscripts
